play

Class Menu

  • java.lang.Object
    • play.Menu

  • public class Menu
extends java.lang.Object
    Class representing the menu of the game

    A menu is defined by those informations :

    • keyboard :
    • game :

    A menu can have actions such as :

    • create perso :
    • create warrior :
    • create wizard:
    • update perso :
    • menu choices :
    • end game :
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Marl√®ne

      • updatePerso

        public void updatePerso(Perso perso)
        Update a perso.

        Ask user to put informations to update name, life level and attack strength of the perso.

        Parameters:
        perso - The perso to be updated
        See Also:
        keyboard, Perso.setName(String), Perso.setLifeLevel(int), Perso.setAttackStrength(int)

      • endGame

        public void endGame()
        End of the game.

        Terminate the game, switching off the console.

        See Also:
        System.exit(int)
